```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate) #today()
library(readr)
library(here)

data_root = "analysis_2022/"
```


```{r}
wq_data <- readRDS(here(data_root,"data_clean", "continuous_wq_2015_2022.rds"))
```

2022 only
```{r}
wq_2022 <- filter(wq_data, Year == 2022)
ggplot(wq_2022) + geom_line(aes(x = Date, y = Daily.Mean, color = Site)) + facet_wrap(~Analyte, scales = "free", nrow = 7) + theme_bw()
```

Across year, by parameter
```{r}
ggplot(wq_data) + geom_line(aes(x = Date, y = Daily.Mean, color = Site)) + facet_wrap(~Analyte, scales = "free")
```
